notes: Landlord investment parameters database for breakeven analysis. Parameters based on typical REIT and institutional investor metrics as of Q4 2025.

landlords.notes: Industrial REIT focused on Class A logistics and distribution facilities. Conservative leverage policy with target LTV 50-55%.

investment_parameters.notes: Updated Q4 2025. Interest rate reflects current 5-year fixed mortgage rates. Dividend yield based on trailing 12-month distribution rate.

properties.notes: Class A industrial property acquired June 2023. Modern facility with 32 ft clear height, ESFR sprinkler system. 31.25% currently leased to Tech Distribution Corp.

landlords.notes: Office REIT with portfolio across major Canadian markets. Higher leverage than industrial peers (60% LTV target).

investment_parameters.notes: Updated Q4 2025. Office assets carry higher leverage and slightly higher cost of capital vs industrial. Building allocation higher (45%) due to less land value in office.

landlords.notes: Institutional fund with diversified portfolio (40% industrial, 35% office, 25% retail). Conservative balance sheet with lower leverage.

investment_parameters.notes: Fund III parameters. Lower leverage (50% LTV) reflects conservative institutional mandate. Blended discount rate for mixed-use portfolio.

landlords.notes: Private family office with concentrated industrial portfolio. Uses higher leverage and demands higher equity returns than REITs.

investment_parameters.notes: Private owner with aggressive leverage strategy. Higher required equity returns (8% vs REIT 6.5-7%). Shorter amortization (20 yrs) typical for private financing.

landlords.notes: Sample entity for testing calculator functionality. Uses standard/typical parameters.

investment_parameters.notes: Standard parameters for industrial REIT testing.
